DataElement.preferredName: Person Family or Friends Had to Permanently Quit Their Job to Help with My Care Needs Because of My Cancer Diagnosis or Treatment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether family or friends had to permanently quit their job to help with their care needs because of cancer diagnosis or treatment.
